snippet: A man accused of detonating a bomb this summer in Beijing Capital International Airport pleaded not guilty on Tuesday. No one was injured in the blast.
lead_paragraph: A man accused of detonating a bomb this summer in Beijing Capital International Airport pleaded not guilty on Tuesday. No one was injured in the blast.

headline.main: China: Accused Bomber Claims Explosion Was Unintentional
headline.print_headline: China: Accused Bomber Claims Explosion Was Unintentional
